results.title: Association of antidiabetic medication and statins with survival from ductal and lobular breast carcinoma in women with type 2 diabetes
results.text_hl: In the @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ductal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044584 @@@IDC@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, mortality from other causes of @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ was found to be lower amongst @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users compared to other oral ADM users.

citations.NLM: Hosio M, Urpilainen E, Hautakoski A, Marttila M, Arffman M, Sund R, Ahtikoski A, Puistola U, Läärä E, Karihtala P, Jukkola A. Association of antidiabetic medication and statins with survival from ductal and lobular breast carcinoma in women with type 2 diabetes Sci Rep. 2021 May 17;11(1):10445. PMID: 34001921
